Engineering Capabilities

M&E • HVAC • Civil Works • Fabrication

HVAC & MVAC Systems

We provide full-spectrum Mechanical Ventilation and Air Conditioning solutions tailored for industrial factories and clean rooms.

  • Ducting & Fittings (Fabrication & Install)
  • Chiller & Cooling Tower Setup/Servicing
  • Exhaust Duct Systems
  • Clean Room Systems (SUS/Iron)

Environmental Engineering (WWTP)

Specialists in Waste Water Treatment Plant design, expansion, and maintenance using advanced biological technologies.

  • MBR (Membrane Bioreactor) Systems
  • MBBR (Moving Bed Biofilm Reactor)
  • Lamella Clarifiers
  • STP & WWTP Piping Installation

General Contractor & Fabrication

From civil works to specialized equipment fabrication, we ensure your facility infrastructure is built to last.

  • Epoxy Flooring (Industrial Grade)
  • Steel Structure & Canopy Works
  • Air Compressor & Dryer Setup
  • Factory Renovation & M&E Installation
